<b>One tenth</b> of every other dragon a.english: One tenth of every other dragon aura, combined.
<b>One tenth</b> of every other dragon a.chinese: 同时激活其他所有龙之光环效果的十分之一。

[Wrinklegill quote]This mushroom's odor.english: This mushroom's odor resembles that of a well-done steak, and is said to whet the appetite - making one's stomach start gurgling within seconds.
[Wrinklegill quote]This mushroom's odor.chinese: 这种蘑菇散发出的气味闻起来很像全熟的牛排，据说可以增进食欲——几秒钟内就能让人肚子咕咕叫。
